column4: my computer will not boot all the way into gnome and i cannot access run level 1 however playing w/ the initial boots and stuff i did manage to get to a prompt (not grub) but liek a run level prompt and now i cannot reproduce it
You should be able to boot into recovery mode
how do i do that?
In the grub menu entry, it should have at least two entries, one being recovery mode
root, kernak..., and initrd
Then on the kernel line, you would replace quiet with single
that put a whole bunch of stuff up on the screeen as it booted then it died it is a black screeen w/ no promop
that sucks man. How did this start happening?
my libcups2 was updating and the computer turned off and now im in the state
Do you know how to boot a live cd and chroot into the file system?
i got it so i have a promtp
Ok now first thing to do is 'apt-get update && apt-get upgrade'
Make sure that returns without error
ifconfig $IFACE up
Replace $IFACE with the real name of the interface (as reported by ifconfig)
what says that?
use ifconfig wlan0 up
that indicates success
What command is giving you that message? kinda hard for us to guess :P
Why are you trying to use ifup? The iface should already be up if 'ifconfig wlan0 up' succeeded
I assume you're trying to connect to the wireless ap. Does iwconfig show wlan9 iface?
i got an IP and im doing the updates now
cool
What's the error?
